G H A P. LI. Beth-lehem.

THE Jews are very silent about this city : nor do I remember that I have read any thing in them concerning it, besides those things which are produced out of the Old Testament3 this only excepted, that the Jerusalem Gemaristsn do confess that the Messias was born there before their times.
